definitions: Move from one place to another.
Convey from one person or place to another.
Change to another place, job, or situation.
To make a legal conveyance of (property or a right).
To copy (data or a program) from one storage medium to another.
examples: Please transfer the files to the new server.
She will transfer to the London office next month.
The bank can transfer funds electronically.
He decided to transfer his shares to his daughter.
The image was transferred onto the canvas.
